institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 31 (Management of terminated companies)
contents: Article 31 (Management of terminated companies) ① Pursuant to Article 6, Paragraph 3 of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations, the Chairman of the Board shall, if a company that received support during the maximum support period (hereinafter referred to as a “terminated company”) intends to continue carrying out learning organization activities, shall terminate the support company. Depending on the results of the performance evaluation, support can be provided to continuously carry out learning activities such as learning infrastructure support and learning network activities., ② In the case of supporting the construction of learning infrastructure in accordance with paragraph 1, the condition is to conduct autonomous learning organization activities for 3 years. Support is provided, and the head of the affiliated organization must provide follow-up management, such as monitoring, during the relevant period.
